## FieldDropdown.getOptions() method

Return a list of the options for this dropdown.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getOptions(opt_useCache?: boolean): any[][];
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  opt\_useCache | boolean | <i>(Optional)</i> For dynamic options, whether or not to use the cached options or to re-generate them.  A non-empty array of option tuples: (human-readable text or image, language-neutral name). |

<b>Returns:</b>

any\[\]\[\]

## Exceptions

{<!-- -->TypeError<!-- -->} If generated options are incorrectly structured.
